column2: Anthem offers $184 per share for Cigna
column3: CEO role holds up dealUPDATE 4-Anthem offers $47 bln for Cigna as insurers race for a deal NEW YORK
column4: June 20 U.S. health insurer Anthem Inc  said on Saturday it had offered $47 billion in cash and stock for smaller rival Cigna Corp
column5: signaling a pick-up in the industry's long-awaited consolidation.  UPDATE 4-Anthem offers $47 bln for Cigna as insurers race for a deal NEW YORK
